issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Support GROUP BY for Dictionary columns
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11289](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11289). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
If you try and run a query that groups on a column encoded as a Dictionary you get an error about "unsupported GROUP BY type". You should get the same result as if your data was encoded using a primitive array type.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11289?focusedCommentId=17284940) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9233
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9233>
